column6:
The man from the future: Ultimate Cable, makes his final stand against those from the present who oppose him...and death will follow. It's the end of the road for one of the X-Men. And you'll be shocked and saddened by who it will be... Part 4 (of 4),2007,1
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | colorist:Jason Keith | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller (cover):Ben Oliver
